posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe D.
$95 delivered / insured.

I picked this up on eBay a while back.   

From posting it on the main board - the diamond shaped home plate dates the photo to prior to 1900.


I believe it to be original - but I am not a photography expert.  I hate to give that kind of hedge on a listing... I shined the blacklight - nothing glowed and nothing looks fishy.  If someone feels otherwise - let me know.


Anyway - a great baseball image for $95.

Email with any questions.... and if you would like a better front / back scan - I can do that tonight and send it off to you.

edit to add:  It measures approximately 4" x 5".

[IMG]http://www.internetville.com/images/albums/userpics/10001/1800sball2.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Joe D.
now $75 delivered / insured.
